com.github.dankinsoid.multicursor VimMulticursor dankinsoid
com.intellij.modules.platform IdeaVIM A powerful extension for IdeaVim that adds multiple cursors and selections through Vim commands. Use 'mc' prefix to create multiple cursors or 'ms' prefix to create multiple selections, followed by any supported Vim command. All commands work within selected text if there's an active selection.
Supported Commands: • Navigation - Word: w/W (next word), b/B (prev word), e/E (word end) - Character: f/F (find char), t/T (till char) - Pattern: / (regex search)
• Text Objects - Word: aw (around word), iw (inside word) - Brackets: ab/ib (), aB/iB {} - Quotes: a'/i' '', a"/i" "", a`/i` `` - Any bracket/quote: aa/ia (smart matching)
• Cursor Management - mcc: Add/remove cursor at position - mcr: Convert virtual cursors to real - mcd: Clear all cursors - mcaw: Add at word boundaries - mcia/mcaa: Inside/around any bracket
Features: - Smart bracket/quote matching - Nested delimiters support - Works in selected regions - Preserves cursor positions
Full guide: https://github.com/dankinsoid/VimMulticursor
